entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: The main antagonist, a dark wizard who lost his powers and body.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: The protagonist, a young boy with a scar on his forehead.

entities.name: the snake
entities.description: A snake that is circling around Harry and Voldemort.

entities.name: harry's mother
entities.description: Harry's mother who died trying to save him.

relationships.description: Voldemort tried to kill Harry on the night he lost his powers and body.
Harry's mother left upon him the traces of her sacrifice, providing him with a protection that Voldemort could not touch.
